text: Na so Allah na inadn Iyan rkano so manga walay niyo a Kadnan; go inadn Iyan rkano so manga kobal o manga ayam, a manga walay, a kaakhapan kano ron ko alongan a gii niyo kathotogalin, go so alongan a kaggnk iyo; go (inadn Iyan rkano) so manga bombol o bilibili, go so manga bombol o onta, go so manga bombol o kambing, a kasangkapan, go pagigimo taman ko masa (a kakharata iyan)
